mapper.insert: insert into challenge (title, board_category, contents, start_challenge, end_challenge, join_member) values (#{title}, #{boardCategory}, #{contents}, #{startChallenge}, #{endChallenge}, #{joinMember});
mapper.select: select challenge_id, title, board_category, contents, start_challenge, end_challenge, join_member from challenge where challenge_id = #{challengeId};
select challenge_id, title, board_category, contents, start_challenge, end_challenge, join_member from challenge order by start_challenge DESC, end_challenge ASC;
mapper.update: update challenge set join_member = #{joinMember} + 1 where challenge_id = #{challengeId};
